transform_def.string: let nz = if p_in.y < 1.0 && p_in.y > -1.0 then vec2(errFunc(p_in.x),p_in.y) else let nz0 = vec2(p_in.x, p_in.y + (p_in.y > 0.0 ? -1.0 : 1.0)) r = errFunc(length(nz0)) a = atan2(nz0.y, nz0.x) cz = vec2(cos(a), sin(a)) * r in vec2(cz.x, cz.y + (cz.y >= 0.0 ? 1.0 : -1.0)) in nz * weight
